info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 12:37AM CDT until June 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COMANCHE...SOUTHERN GRADY...SOUTHERN CADDO AND NORTHWESTERN STEPHENS COUNTIES... At 1236 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Gracemont to 3 miles west of Norge to 8 miles west of Marlow, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Anadarko, Marlow, Elgin, Apache, Rush Springs, Bray, Fletcher, Cyril, Sterling, Fort Cobb, Alex, Verden, Cement, Gracemont, Norge, Bradley, Boone, Lake Chickasha and Agawam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
